King Blue

My name is Blue. The way I see it there is only black and white in this issue. If you believe an unborn child is an innocent person, then killing that person is murder under any circumstance and is unjustifiable. If you dont believe that an unborn child is a person then you have nothing to worry about. However, most scientific research points to the former.
 
 To those that say abortion is murder, your complaining tends to drive me crazy sometimes. If you so strongly believe its murder then why do you sit and complain instead of taking action? Murder is murder, whether it's a faceless baby or your own mother it should enrage you. Why do you sit by and tell yourself there is nothing you can do but argue? Thats not true. Of coarse, if you tried to stop an abortion you would be arrested. So you see, it really comes down to the government. If the government decided they wouldn't stop you there would be no more abortions. All the clinics would be torn down in a matter of days by anti-abortionists.
 
 This is the reason why I am against the government. The government assists in murder. I told the white house up front that I would rob its people and be against it if it didn't change. They should have arrested me right there. If you support a government that helps kill innocent people you are my enemy.
